Description: The clock icon, or sync button, scrolls the clip carousel to show the currently playing clip. This is useful when the number of clips exceeds the width of your browser window
Clicking on a clip title from the carousel will move video/audio playback to the start of that clip
The edit icon opens the annotation for further editing
The "x" button deletes a clip without conformation (a quick delete)
The currently playing clip will have a red border
